page.title: 07SOCIAL LIFE IN GOLDEN CROSS
page.content:
There are a few of general meetings in Chiddingly Village Hall. The dicussion is often concerned with the progess of the proposed development and schemes. Sometimes this will include restoration or improvement or certain amenities or constructions.
The council also arrange some parties or celebrations which are usually held in some villagers' homes or gardens. This provides an opportunity for the people to meet and talk to their friends.
There are also dog and horse shows which people enjoy. Villagers usually give support to the show, e.g prepare refreshment for the show.
